user_query: place is just a bunch of a bunch of gay dudes man it's gay as all fuck we got to get out of here fuck you man and it's just that's not the best way to introduce characters that's not the best way to fill out your characters and make us actually care for them that kind of makes me want to see them get a little bit tortured just because I'm annoyed by them those are the types of people that I used to hate being around whenever I was in my 20s and so that always holds back his movies a lot of that does dissipate by the second half once you get into the horror stuff that mostly gets pushed into the background but it's very prevalent in the first half of the film and I could see a lot of people being turned off by it Beyond just the dialogue too there's a number of horror cliches and you I would almost say lazy horror writing that like the tropes that just find their way into this movie in certain spots the biggest one for me is after Josh and Oli have disappeared and now Paxton is trying to find them totally understand a worried friend not wanting to abandon a very close personal friend of his in a foreign land and wanting to get down to the bottom of things but when you have a situation where his friends have now disappeared everybody around him is acting like they've never even seen the dude before which had set off a bunch of alarm Bells he finds the two chicks that they've been fucking and they look like a couple of cracked out meth bitches and then they lead him all the way
